data.title: Saint James Roman Catholic Church
data.text:
Clike the link below to sign up for Adoration during our 40 Hours Celebration Aug. 11, 12, and 13

https://forms.gle/ye7ES9kd7YGjnuFw7

Click the link below for this week's Mass

https://www.facebook.com/saintjamesrcc/videos/514923167566688

Click the link below to submit intentions for the parish prayer chain.

https://tinyurl.com/saint-james-prayer-chain

Welcome!

St. James Parish is a welcoming and accepting family of faith located at 2635 Buffalo Road in Erie, Pennsylvania. It is a friendly and caring community that embraces visitors and welcomes those in need of a new church home. New comers arrive as strangers and leave Mass as friends. As the People of God, we rejoice in doing our very best to live and love like Christ! Just as Jesus' arms are open in welcome to all, so too is St. James Church. May the Lordâ€™s choicest blessing be yours today and always!
